content: i m so thrilled about this pattern it s easy to crochet it has a little shaping- that makes it perfect for beginners and it looks so beautiful the crochet crazy love top looks very cool and it became a basic in my wardrobe i wear it with jeans skirts and shorts i love to wear it with the sleeves folded i think it looks classic and cool at the same time for my crochet top i ve used almost 300 g 6 x 50 g cotton yarn and a 2 5 mm hook the pattern only uses basic stitches chain single_crochet and double_crochet and is very easy to crochet the final dimensions of the crazy love top are 49 cm width and 52 long including the shoulders link text 1 1 https //turquoisewithvanilla com/2020/08/05/crochet-crazy-love-top/
